title: Add moat-and-trees footer graphic for bottom of tab pages

requirements.text: Generate a new decorative footer background graphic, visually consistent with the existing castle hero banner style, featuring a water moat and trees, sized to work as a bottom-of-page strip on all tab pages.

quotes:
Can you create a different graphic similar to The castle background behind the title (Heroes and Villains in Higher Education: Resilience and The Role of Next Generation Student Leaders)
that will fit for the bottom of the tab pages like water (a mote) and some trees or something

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/moat-trees-footer-banner.dim_1600x300.png.
The graphic is purely visual (no embedded text) and reads well when cropped responsively across common screen widths.
The graphic’s style matches the existing hero banner aesthetic (similar palette/illustration style to /assets/generated/institution-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png).

requirements.text: Render the new moat-and-trees footer graphic as a full-width bottom-of-page visual element on all routed pages (the tab pages), positioned above the global footer so it appears at the bottom of each page’s content area.

quotes: that will fit for the bottom of the tab pages like water (a mote) and some trees or something

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to each route (e.g., Overview, Bio, Learning Outcomes, Takeaways, Activities, Slides, References, Movie References, Leadership Board) displays the moat/trees image as a bottom strip above the existing footer.
The image does not overlap page content and remains responsive (full width, fixed height or max-height, with appropriate object-fit).
No backend changes are required for this feature.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths (compose existing components instead).
Do not route generated images through the backend; serve them as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Changing the existing hero banner image (/assets/generated/institution-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png).
Adding new navigation tabs or changing the routing structure.
Adding any new backend endpoints or data models.

required: Castle-style moat and trees footer banner illustration (moat-trees-footer-banner.dim_1600x300.png)
